semantics.label: Maelekezo
semantics.description: Wanafunzi wataona maelekezo haya juu ya maelezo.

semantics.label: Maudhui ya zoezi
semantics.description: Students will see these instructions on top of the notes.

fields.label: Onyesha maelezo wakati wa kuanza
fields.description: Wakati chaguo hili limezimwa, maelezo yanafichwa wakati wa kuanza. Maelezo yanafichwa kiotomatiki kwenye maonyesho madogo.

fields.label: Cue field placeholder
fields.default: Enter your comments, questions, the main idea, etc. that you derive from your notes
fields.description: Placeholder for the cue section as a reminder for your students

fields.label: Notes field placeholder
fields.default: Enter dates, details, definitions, formulas, examples, etc. from the source material
fields.description: Placeholder for the notes section as a reminder for your students

fields.label: Summary field placeholder
fields.description: Placeholder for the summary section as a reminder for your students

fields.label: Maelezo hayawezi kuhifadhiwa
fields.default: Jukwaa ama aidha haliauni kipengele cha njia ya kuhifadhi maudhui au halijaamilishwa katika mipangilio ya jukwaa au hujaingia. Maelezo yako hayawezi kuhifadhiwa!

fields.label: Maelezo yamenakiliwa kwenye ubao wa kunakili
fields.default: Maelezo yamenakiliwa kwenye ubao wa kunakili

fields.label: Kichwa cha kitufe cha skrini kamili (ingiza)
Mada ya kitufe cha skrini kamili (toka)
fields.default: Toka kwenye njia ya skrini kamili

fields.label: Mada ya kitufe cha Geuza (maelezo yakifungwa)
Mada ya kitufe cha Geuza (maelezo yakifunguliwa)
Maelezo yamefunguliwa
fields.default: Mwonekano umebadilika hadi kwenye maelezo yako.

fields.label: Hide notes
fields.description: @label is a placeholder and will be replaced with the respective label of the notes field.

fields.label: Show notes
fields.description: @label is a placeholder and will be replaced with the respective label of the notes field.
